name: Northern Spy's Celery Tonic
description: A light celery-based cocktail inspired by the gin and tonic, from Chris Ronin of Manhattan's Northern Spy. It's refreshing, bitter, and just a little tart.
recipeIngredient: 18 ounces Cocchi Aperitivo Americano Bianco, chilled
12 ounces strained fresh juice from 10 to 12 celery stalks
3 ounces strained fresh juice from 3 lemons

recipeInstructions.text: Stir Cocchi, vermouth, celery juice, and lemon juice in a pitcher. Divide between ice-filled glasses. Garnish each glass with a marjoram sprig.
